function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of scrutiny and blind trust in academic research culture","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spreading of disinformation through social media and mainstream media","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pitfalls of pandemic publishing raising questions about peer-review processes, scientific integrity, and data fraud","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Amplification of flawed trial data through unreliable meta-analyses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failures in peer review leading to publication of low-quality or misleading research","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unproven treatments being peddled by influential figures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scandals involving faked research data eroding trust in peer review and scientific integrity","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dissemination of unsubstantiated claims about the effectiveness of ivermectin in treating covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate data from the now-discredited surgisphere database influencing treatment recommendations and national policies.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rollout of mass drug-administration campaigns in response to unsubstantiated recommendations, causing diversion of drug supplies from neglected disease programs.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Preprints with questionable or fraudulent information being used to support ineffective treatments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misleading or incorrect preprints leading to the dissemination of unreliable information","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid dissemination of preprints without critical review or verification","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of disinformation through preprints and press releases","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Publication of incorrect or misleading information","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through research activities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preprints with inaccurate information leading to misguided policies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pre-symptomatic transmission not accounted for in contact tracing policies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreliance on preprints without comprehensive review","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid dissemination of unvetted preprints","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misleading or false information spread through preprints","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear responsibility for managing and evaluating preprints","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid data sharing of medical discoveries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High volume of preprints and papers","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Global network of virologists and infectious-disease experts","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty carrying out face-to-face surveys during peak breakout of covid-19 and subsequent epidemic prevention periods","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Strict epidemic prevention and control measures limiting the scope of surveys","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid development of noncontact interaction activities in urban communities.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant differences in people’s habits of using existing community service facilities.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impact on virtual and physical space","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reflection on the development of urban communities triggered by covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Blurred functional boundaries and virtual circle may lead to increased spread of contagious diseases within the community","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in community service facility planning may lead to inadequate or ineffective response to contagious disease outbreaks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of non-contact interaction activities may create new pathways for contagious diseases to spread within the community","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact on community planning model due to non-contact interaction activities under the influence of covid-19.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on non-contact interaction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fundamental change in the concept of community space","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of virtual and physical space in the community","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased need for non-contact service activities in the 5-min community life circle","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Varying impact of non-contact interaction activities on community facilities post-covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scale effect of urgency in using community service facilities during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Non-contact interaction activities may have varying degrees of impact on different types of service facilities within the community, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of non-contact interaction on community service facilities may lead to differential impacts on different types of facilities.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant spatial scale effect of non-contact interaction activities may lead to complex and variable impacts on community service facilities.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-contact interaction may lead to challenges in adapting community service facilities to meet the various needs of residents in the post-epidemic period.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in non-contact interaction leading to migration of community activities to virtual space","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Composite space and non-contact interaction as the basis of community life post-epidemic","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex and significant changes in community organization and space configuration","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-contact interaction activities weakening spatial and temporal constraints","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate replacement of physical space with virtual space for gathering and communicating","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
